categories: Category:Imperial Army personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Bladedust was a male Human armsmaster in the Imperial Army of the Sith Empire who was stationed on the planet Taris.

Armsmaster Bladedust appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Weapons Vendor for Imperial players on Taris. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, he was removed from the game along with the rest of the Weapons Vendors.
